ygData.subject: Gnomish Fireworks
ygData.msgSnippet: Just my two cents worth about tinkering Gnomish Fireworks -- I have created them and could not wait to try them out and see this wonderful display of bursting
ygData.messageBody:
Just my two cents worth about tinkering Gnomish Fireworks -- I have created them and could not wait to try them out and see this wonderful display of bursting colors. I nervously double clicked the fireworks (pressed f9 to get the best view) and phffff a little tiny poof of what i think it was color -- it was so damn quick and small i couldn't make out what had happened -- Verant come on geeze what would it take to make it at least look a little bit like fireworks. when you cast a spell you have beautiful colors and displays and then there is what you give the Gnome tinkering. dont give us a skill and make us look stupid by not having it do anything.


Gnorm / level 34 / Cleric / Bristlebane
